author: jochembrouwer
content: <@!758579010027782144> we are getting RLPx messages with a prefix code of 0x04, but this is not specified in the RLPx protocol. Does Nethermind have extra messages built on top of RLPx?

author: jochembrouwer
content: We either have an internal problem with RLP or our devp2p is not understanding Nethermind. I am getting messages over RLPx which have bodies of 1024 bytes, but if I inspect the body then the RLP states that it should be ~33k bytes and thus I cannot decode it

author: lightclient
content: Anyone know how to connect openethereum to eth stats server?
